EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO services for 2012 (1326747443.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4
Hi Danilo,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful:
Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule.
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Danilo Herrera [mailto:daniloherrera1@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 11:02 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO services for 2012
3:30 works for me. I'll be expecting your call. Thanks On Mon, Jan 16, 2012 at 10:42 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Danilo,
You are very welcome. I actually will not be available during that time today, I will be available either around 3:30pm or tomorrow I have between 10:00am-1:00pm available. Please let me know what works best for you.
Thanks! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Danilo Herrera [mailto:daniloherrera1@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 10:34 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO services for 2012
Thanks for replying so quickly. Although I am open to opportunities that come from PDC, I will continue working for my own clients. I would like MBO to run my billings. I have some questions that I would like to ask you. Can we set a time when you can call me? I can around around 1 pm or 2 pm. will that work for you. On Mon, Jan 16, 2012 at 10:17 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Danilo,
Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. Do you plan on working with Proposal Development Consultants again this year for your consulting work or have you found your own clients and you would like to run your billings through MBO for that work?
Please advise and if you have any additional questions for me please do not hesitate to reach out.
Thanks! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
